description:
Unified Counseling & Mediation specializes in providing confidential mental health counseling services to children, adolescents, adults, and families. We also provide intensive employee assistance program (EAP), marital, couples and group psychotherapy services.

SPECIALTY AREAS: 
ADHD, Anger Management, Anxiety, Behavioral/Conduct Issues, Depression, eTherapy, Gifted Evaluations, Grief/Bereavement, Learning Disabilities, Marital/Divorce, Parenting Skills, Psychological Testing, Stress Management, and Substance Abuse.
name: UNIFIED COUNSELING & MEDIATION, PLLC.
